name: ITO: World Within
description:
This project was done as a prototype for a platformer that would explore the idea of working through mental illness. The inspiration was how well Celeste approached this concept without it feeling like a PSA.

Made in one month I am pleased with the result but have decided that for now, the game will remain in prototype form.

I hope you enjoy your experience even with some of the bugs that are in the project.

Move around with WASD (Arrow keys do work, but WASD is recommended)

Jump with Space

Use ability with Left Shift

Esc for Pause Menu

This project is the result of completing the final project for Game Development I at the University of Central Missouri. Finished Dec. 3rd, 2021
